intro: Leucodermis, commonly known as the white skin plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its smooth, pale green to white leaves and showy, five-petaled flowers that range in color from pink to purple. Leucodermis species are relatively easy to care for, making them popular choices for indoor gardening.
